fields.name: Shoyu Ramen
fields.description: A savory soy sauce-based ramen with pork belly, bamboo shoots, and a soft-boiled egg.

fields.name: Miso Ramen
fields.description: Rich and creamy miso-based ramen with tofu, corn, and nori.

fields.name: Spicy Ramen
fields.description: A fiery broth with chili paste, ground pork, and a spicy kick.

fields.name: Vegetarian Ramen
fields.description: A vegetarian ramen made with a rich broth of miso and vegetables, topped with tofu and greens.

fields.name: Chashu Ramen
fields.description: Tender slices of pork belly in a savory soy-based broth, topped with a soft-boiled egg.

fields.name: Tonkotsu Ramen
fields.description: A rich and creamy pork broth with thick noodles, topped with pork belly and a soft-boiled egg.

fields.name: Gyoza
fields.description: Crispy pork dumplings served with a soy dipping sauce.

fields.name: Edamame
fields.description: Steamed and salted soybeans, perfect for sharing.

fields.name: Takoyaki
fields.description: Octopus-filled savory Japanese balls topped with bonito flakes and takoyaki sauce.

fields.name: Tempura
fields.description: Lightly battered and fried shrimp and vegetables.

fields.name: Spring Rolls
fields.description: Crispy and savory rolls filled with vegetables and served with dipping sauce.

fields.name: Chashu Don
fields.description: Steamed rice topped with tender slices of marinated pork belly and green onions.

fields.name: Ramune Soda
fields.description: A refreshing Japanese carbonated drink with a marble stopper.

fields.name: Iced Green Tea
fields.description: Refreshing cold brewed green tea, perfect for cooling off.

fields.name: Matcha Latte
fields.description: A smooth and creamy green tea latte, made with authentic matcha powder.

fields.name: Lemonade
fields.description: Freshly squeezed lemonade served over ice.

fields.name: Coca-Cola
fields.description: Classic carbonated soft drink.

fields.name: Orange Fanta
fields.description: A tangy, sweet orange-flavored soft drink.

fields.name: Karaage
fields.description: Japanese-style fried chicken, crispy on the outside and tender on the inside.

fields.name: Sashimi
fields.description: Fresh slices of raw fish, served with soy sauce and wasabi.
